content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy Discover how to find, evaluate and manage information through our online training events and resources. Information skills are important for your studies, research and life after university. Developing these skills will help you to find, assess and use information in the most effective way. Discover the key resources for your subject area from books and journals to subject databases and specialist information Our collection of online resources introduces you to a wide range of information skills. Work through them at your own pace and revisit them anytime. Find out how to use EndNote to manage your references. Back to the top Join our weekly themed webinars for an insight into different the different areas of information skills or request a one-to-one appointment to delve further into a specific question. Request a tailored information skills session for your students or embed our asynchronous resources in your modules to support coursework and assignments. To find out more visit Support for teaching. Support for researchers Support for your studies Libraries help and support King's Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR Please see our Help and support page for telephone and email contact points
